description: The Indian Railways have come a long way since the chugging of the first train on Indian soil in April of 1853. India has always looked at the Railways as a vital infrastructure enabling it to deliver
caption: narendramodi.in
message: My colleague Suresh Prabhu writes about 'Transforming Indian Railways with the OneICT Programme' on the NM App. A good read.  http://nm-4.com/5wp4
